description:
Top-Notch Legal Advocacy Throughout Western North Dakota

With four offices located throughout western North Dakota, Sand Law provides convenient access to the high-quality, effective representation you need for your most serious legal challenges involving criminal defense, personal injury and business law.

Serving Ward County and the surrounding areas from our law office in Minot, North Dakota, the attorneys at our law firm are fully committed to protecting your rights, liberties and interests while helping you achieve the best possible outcome for your situation.

Criminal Defense And Personal Injury

Whether you face criminal charges or need help obtaining your rightful compensation following an injury or loss you suffered as the result of someone else's negligence, you can trust us to advocate strongly on your behalf to help you find the justice you seek.

Comprehensive Business Support

For those looking to establish their own businesses, we can help you set up your company the right way, and we will be there for ongoing counsel and support to help your commercial enterprise succeed. Likewise, existing business owners can count on us for outside counsel, and we can deliver top-notch representation for all types of civil and commercial litigation, including debt collection, contract disputes and more.

The Experience You Need, The Results You Expect

Led by experienced attorneys Rick Sand and William Anthony Sand, our law firm has earned the respect of both our clients and our peers, and we have received numerous awards and honors for our high ethical standards and exceptional legal ability. This means you can rest easy knowing your case is in the most capable hands possible.

No matter how complex or serious your circumstances, you can trust Sand Law to help you find a solution. To discuss your specific needs with one of our attorneys risk-free, you can contact our law firm to schedule a consultation at no cost.
